description:
Thanks to Tamama`s G-force endurance test machine, Momoka accidentally gets split into two people: Momoka and Dark Momoka.  Momoka is as timid as ever, while Dark Momoka decides to displace Keroro and force the frogs to take over the Earth her way!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Momoka Ura Momoka Kourin de Arimasu / Ura Momoka Uragiri no Uragawa de Arimasu
桃華裏桃華降臨 であります / 裏桃華裏切りの裏側 であります
